verses.verse: Now <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> was <S%H5462>tightly<s%> shut <S%H5462>up<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> No one went <S%H3318>out,<s%> and no one came <S%H935>in.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H7200>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> with its <S%H4428>king<s%> and the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor.<s%>

All your <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> shall march <S%H5437>around<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> going <S%H5362>around<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H6471>once.<s%> You shall <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> of <S%H3104>rams<s%>' horns <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark.<s%> On the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> you shall <S%H5437>march<s%> around the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets.<s%>

It shall be that when they make a <S%H4900>long<s%> blast with the <S%H3104>ram<s%>'s <S%H7161>horn,<s%> and when you <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> all the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H7321>shout<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7321>shout;<s%> and the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall fall <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H8478>flat,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall go <S%H5927>up<s%> every man straight before <S%H376>him.<s%>"

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5375>them,<s%> "Take up the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and let <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> of <S%H3104>rams<s%>' horns <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"

They <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H5674>"Advance!<s%> March <S%H5437>around<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and let the <S%H2502>armed<s%> men pass <S%H5674>on<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H727>ark.<s%>"

It was <S%H3091>so,<s%> that when Joshua had <S%H559>spoken<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5375>bearing<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> of <S%H3104>rams<s%>' horns <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5674>advanced,<s%> and <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets;<s%> and the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1980>followed<s%> <S%H310>them.<s%>

The <S%H2502>armed<s%> men <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets,<s%> and the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H622>them.<s%> The <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> <S%H8628>sounded<s%> as they <S%H1980>went.<s%>

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "You shall not <S%H7321>shout,<s%> nor let your <S%H6963>voice<s%> be <S%H8085>heard,<s%> neither shall any <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H3318>proceed<s%> out of your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> until the <S%H3117>day<s%> I <S%H559>tell<s%> you to <S%H7321>shout.<s%> Then you shall <S%H7321>shout.<s%>"

So he caused the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to go <S%H5437>around<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> going <S%H5362>about<s%> it <S%H6471>once.<s%> Then they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and <S%H3885>lodged<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>
<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> rose <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> took <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

The <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5375>bearing<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> of <S%H3104>rams<s%>' horns <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> went <S%H1980>on<s%> <S%H1980>continually,<s%> and <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets:<s%> and the armed <S%H2502>men<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H622>them.<s%> The rear guard <S%H1980>came<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> The <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> <S%H8628>sounded<s%> as they <S%H1980>went.<s%>

The <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> they marched <S%H5437>around<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H6471>once,<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp.<s%> They <S%H6213>did<s%> this <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

It happened on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that they rose <S%H7925>early<s%> at the <S%H5927>dawning<s%> of the <S%H7837>day,<s%> and marched <S%H5437>around<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> in the same <S%H4941>way<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times.<s%> Only on this <S%H3117>day<s%> they marched <S%H5437>around<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times.<s%>

It happened at the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H6471>time,<s%> when the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets,<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H7321>"Shout,<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> you the <S%H5892>city!<s%>

The <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H2764>devoted,<s%> even it and all that is in <S%H3068>it,<s%> to Yahweh. Only <S%H7343>Rahab<s%> the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> shall <S%H2421>live,<s%> she and all who are with her in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> because she <S%H2244>hid<s%> the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> that we <S%H7971>sent.<s%>

But as for <S%H7535>you,<s%> only <S%H8104>keep<s%> yourselves from the devoted <S%H2764>thing,<s%> lest when you have <S%H2763>devoted<s%> <S%H3947>it,<s%> you take of the devoted <S%H2764>thing;<s%> so would you <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2764>accursed,<s%> and trouble <S%H5916>it.<s%>

But all the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> and <S%H1270>iron,<s%> are <S%H6944>holy<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> They shall <S%H935>come<s%> into <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H214>treasury.<s%>"

So the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7321>shouted,<s%> and the priests <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets.<s%> It <S%H5971>happened,<s%> when the people <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7321>shouted<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8643>shout,<s%> and the <S%H2346>wall<s%> fell down <S%H5307>flat,<s%> so that the <S%H5971>people<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H5892>city,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> straight before <S%H3920>him,<s%> and they took the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

They utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> all that was in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> both <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H802>woman,<s%> both <S%H5288>young<s%> and <S%H2205>old,<s%> and <S%H7794>ox,<s%> and <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> and <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> who had spied <S%H7270>out<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H935>"Go<s%> into the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and bring <S%H3318>out<s%> from there the <S%H802>woman<s%> and all that she <S%H7650>has,<s%> as you swore to her."

The young <S%H5288>men<s%> who were <S%H7270>spies<s%> went <S%H935>in,<s%> and brought <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7343>Rahab<s%> with her <S%H1>father,<s%> her <S%H517>mother,<s%> her <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and all that she <S%H3318>had.<s%> They also brought out all her <S%H4940>relatives,<s%> and they <S%H3240>set<s%> them <S%H2351>outside<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

They <S%H8313>burnt<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and all that was in <S%H5414>it.<s%> Only they put the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> the <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> and of <S%H1270>iron<s%> into the <S%H214>treasury<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%>

But <S%H7343>Rahab<s%> the <S%H2181>prostitute,<s%> her <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>household,<s%> and all that she <S%H3091>had,<s%> Joshua <S%H2421>saved<s%> <S%H2421>alive.<s%> She <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H7130>in<s%> the midst of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to this <S%H3117>day,<s%> because she <S%H2244>hid<s%> the <S%H4397>messengers,<s%> whom <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to spy <S%H7270>out<s%> <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7650>commanded<s%> them with an oath at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H779>"Cursed<s%> is the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who rises <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H1129>builds<s%> this <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%> With the loss of his <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> shall he lay its <S%H3245>foundation,<s%> and with the loss of his <S%H6810>youngest<s%> son shall he set <S%H5324>up<s%> its <S%H1817>gates.<s%>"
So <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was with <S%H3091>Joshua;<s%> and his <S%H8089>fame<s%> was in all the <S%H776>land.<s%>
